languages.text: "Пойдем разберемся, зачем Ноктюрн Забвения нас сюда притащил".
"I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."
languages.original_text: "Пойдем разберемся, зачем Ноктюрн Забвения нас сюда притащил".

traits.locale_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion dragged us to this place."
"I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion dragged us to this place."
"I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."
"I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."
"I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."
"I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

languages.text: « Je pense que nous devrions retourner voir le Nocturne de l'Oubli pour comprendre pourquoi il nous a envoyés ici. »
languages.original_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que nous devrions retourner voir le Nocturne de l'Oubli pour comprendre pourquoi il nous a envoyés ici. »

languages.text: “我建议我们到处看看，弄清楚遗忘夜曲为什么要把我们带到这里。”
languages.original_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

traits.locale_text: “我建议我们到处看看，弄清楚遗忘夜曲为什么要把我们带到这里。”

languages.text: 「忘却のノクターンがなぜ{mf|俺|私}たちをこの場所に引きずり込んだのか、その理由を確かめに行ったほうがいいだろう」
languages.original_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

traits.locale_text: 「忘却のノクターンがなぜ{mf|俺|私}たちをこの場所に引きずり込んだのか、その理由を確かめに行ったほうがいいだろう」

languages.text: "Gehen wir los und finden heraus, warum Nocturne des Nichts uns an diesen Ort gebracht hat."
languages.original_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

traits.locale_text: "Gehen wir los und finden heraus, warum Nocturne des Nichts uns an diesen Ort gebracht hat."

languages.text: «Sugiero que vayamos a ver por qué Nocturno del Olvido nos ha arrastrado hasta este lugar».
languages.original_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

traits.locale_text: «Sugiero que vayamos a ver por qué Nocturno del Olvido nos ha arrastrado hasta este lugar».

languages.text: "İyisi mi gidip Nisyan Noktürnü bizi niye buraya sürüklemiş, onu öğrenelim."
languages.original_text: "I suggest we go and see why Nocturne of Oblivion has dragged us to this place."

traits.locale_text: "İyisi mi gidip Nisyan Noktürnü bizi niye buraya sürüklemiş, onu öğrenelim."
